biotools.summary: RTNduals is a tool that searches for possible co-regulatory loops between regulon pairs generated by the RTN package. It compares the shared targets in order to infer 'dual regulons', a new concept that tests whether regulon pairs agree on the predicted downstream effects.

bioschemas.name: RTNduals
